channel.title: Music on Andrew Blance
channel.description: Recent content in Music on Andrew Blance

item.title: jerryPycia
item.description: What a long strange pip its been… Grateful Dead have performed around 2500 shows. Remarkably, around 2200 of these have been recorded. To explore (most of) this data I have created a python package called jerryPycia. I think thats a really funny name. I’m also pretty happy with my “long strange pip” joke. You can install it using pip, like: pip install jerryPycia Its also available on my Github page.

item.title: Dioramarama
item.description: Balthazar III Me and my flatmate have formed a terrible band who have just released an EP. It consists of 5 covers of famous songs! You can listen here! In it I play the guitar, fiddle and a keyboard. My flatmate plays the bass and theremin. We both sing and try to program drums. The EP’s tracks are presented in the reverse order in which we recorded them - meaning we recorded track 5 first.
